mapper.select: select a.idx, a.upp_idx, a.title, a.contents, a.click_cnt, a.delyn, a.rgst_dt, a.rgst_id, b.atchmnfl_nm, b.atchmnfl_size, b.atchmnfl_id, c.thumbnail_image_url from T_CM_BBS a left outer join T_CM_ATCHMNFL b on a.atchmnfl_id = b.atchmnfl_id left outer join T_CM_USER c on a.rgst_id = c.kakao_id where a.delyn = 'N' and a.upp_idx = 0

select a.idx, a.upp_idx, a.title, a.contents, a.click_cnt, a.delyn, a.rgst_dt, a.rgst_id, b.atchmnfl_nm, b.atchmnfl_size, b.atchmnfl_id, c.thumbnail_image_url from T_CM_BBS a left outer join T_CM_ATCHMNFL b on a.atchmnfl_id = b.atchmnfl_id left outer join T_CM_USER c on a.rgst_id = c.kakao_id where a.delyn = 'N' and a.upp_idx = #{idx}
